gate_2_verdict.conclusion_locked: Ranking model validated for ordinal longevity discrimination. Higher score = significantly higher survival probability before expiry.
gate_2_verdict.no_inference_permitted: No predictive or economic edge implied or assumed.

phase_2_activation.purpose: Systematic collection of Outcome data (PnL, direction, MFE/MAE, context) for causal and economic evaluation.
phase_2_activation.clarification_locked: Phase 2 is a measurement and learning layer, not a trading or capital allocation layer.

safety_mechanisms_retained.note: Triggers remain active. They now PERMIT inserts because gate_status = OPEN. Setting gate back to BLOCKED will re-engage the block.

ceo_statement_immutable: Gate 2 confirms that the score ranks hypotheses by survival capability. Phase 2 exists to determine whether this ranking also corresponds with economic outcome. These two levels shall not be mixed.
